title: SBS English
aboutServiceDesc: English trainers are sough from those who have successfully completed their studies from such English speaking countries as Australia, the UK, the USA, Canada, and New Zealand with exceptional teaching and coaching experience and capacities. Interactive teaching methodologies, with the aid of information technology, are utilised to support learners to maximise the absorption of English skills in both academic and daily-life settings. We focus on practical English for specific purposes.

title: SBS Scholarships
aboutServiceDesc: Being prestigious scholarship recipients with more than 10 years of scholarship mentoring, SBS Scholarship Mentors aim to motivate and coach our scholarship mentees to maximise their potentials by strengthening their core capacities and matching with scholarship requirements and criteria. At SBS, Mentor-Mentee relationship is not limited by the border of the scholarship applications but it is expanded to the support along the scholarship journeys of our excellent mentees. Our strengths rest on the research scholarships. All partial coursework scholarship applications are supported for FREE.
